title: Is there a universal translator?
body: I am an NA player and i was wanting to go to the japan server to try to get better but i cant do that if i cant read whats being said. Are there any like universal translators???

replies.body:
We don't have any kind of translator service for you to use at the moment. I do know that there is a decent portion of the JP population that does speak/understand English fairly well, so you may have better luck than you think right now. 

I also know about a smartphone app called Google Translator which does a pretty amazing job for on the fly translating.
